repuestos-merida.name: Repuestos Mérida App
repuestos-merida.description: Mobile app for searching and quoting automotive parts.
repuestos-merida.details: Development of an intuitive mobile app that connects customers to a wide range of spare parts, streamlining the purchasing process and significantly increasing sales since launch.

repolla.name: Repolla
repolla.description: Management and sales platform for Repolla, a leader in its sector.
repolla.details: Since 2009, Repolla has experienced steady growth thanks to digital platform optimization, resulting in an annual return of $16,000 on an initial investment of $4,000.

project-beta.name: Total-Time.app
project-beta.description: Web app for tracking employee performance and coordinating tasks.
project-beta.details: The mobile app improved delivery efficiency by 40% and customer satisfaction by 25% within the first 6 months.

createProjectModal.title: Tell us about your Project
createProjectModal.subtitle: Describe your idea and select an inspiration style to get started.

utility.label: Describe the utility or purpose of your project
utility.placeholder: E.g.: This project will allow users to manage their personal finances from a mobile app...

description.label: Describe your project
description.placeholder: E.g.: I need an online store to sell handmade crafts, with a modern and user-friendly design...

prompts.minimalistNeutral: Minimalist web design with neutral color palette (beige, light gray, off-white), clean lines, ample white space, sophisticated typography, and subtle shadows.
prompts.darkModernTech: Modern tech website interface in dark mode, vibrant accent color (electric blue or neon green), elegant typography, geometric patterns, glossy elements, professional and innovative.
prompts.vibrantPlayful: Vibrant and playful web design, bright color palette (yellow, pink, turquoise), organic shapes, custom illustrations, friendly typography, energetic and engaging.
prompts.elegantLuxury: Elegant luxury brand web design, deep and rich colors (burgundy, gold, black), serif typography, high-quality product photography, sophisticated layout, premium feel.
prompts.ecoNatural: Natural and eco-friendly product website, earth tones (greens, browns, creams), textured backgrounds, organic or handwritten fonts, nature-inspired images, clean and trustworthy.
prompts.retroFuturistic: Retro-futuristic web design, 80s synthwave aesthetic, neon pinks and purples, grid lines, pixelated elements, chrome text effects, nostalgic yet modern.
